description: vmapper - send all logs to discord channel
exec: su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] send all logs to discord by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -sl https://discord.com/api/webhooks/0987654321/1234567890'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] clear vmapper logs by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && rm sdcard/VMHistory.log && rm sdcard/vm.log && sdcard/vmapper.log && sleep 2 && reboot
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] update all apps by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -ua'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] upgrade vmapper by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -uvw'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] downgrade vmapper by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -dvw'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] install vmapper by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -ivw'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] update Pogo by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -upw'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] downgrade Pogo by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -dpwnr'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] force update Pogo by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -fp'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] update config.xml with reboot by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -uvx'

description: vmapper - update vmapper config.xml without reboot
exec: su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] update config.xml without reboot by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -uvxnr'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] update ROM by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && /system/bin/vmapper.sh -urom'

su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] update vmapper.sh by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && mount -o remount,rw / && /system/bin/curl -s -k -L --fail --show-error -o /system/bin/vmapper.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/v-mapper/vmconf/main9/scrips/vmapper.sh && chmod +x /system/bin/vmapper.sh && mount -o remount,ro /'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] restart by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && reboot'
su -c 'echo '[`date '+%-m/%-d/%y %-I:%M %p'`] Vmapper restart by rotom job' >> /sdcard/vmapper.log && am force-stop de.vahrmap.vmapper && am broadcast -n de.vahrmap.vmapper/.RestartService'
